blogPost.excerpt: We have developed a simple web app that lets you find apps on Google Play Store that have high download numbers (100,000+) but poor rating. This is a great business opportunity for anyone who can build a better app and monetize it by providing a paid version
blogPost.body: We have developed a simple web app that lets you find apps on Google Play Store that have high download numbers (100,000+) but poor rating. This is a great business opportunity for anyone who can build a better app and monetize it by providing a paid version
blogPost.title: 1000 Business Ideas - 1000 validated app ideas
blogPost.author: Sagar Patil

localize.description: 我们已经开发了一个简单的网络应用，让你在Google Play Store上找到下载量大（100,000+）但评分差的应用。这对于任何能够建立一个更好的应用程序并通过提供付费版本来盈利的人来说都是一个很好的商机。
我們已經開發了一個簡單的網絡應用，讓你在Google Play Store上找到下載量大（100,000+）但評分差的應用。這對於任何能夠建立一個更好的應用程序並通過提供付費版本來盈利的人來說都是一個很好的商機。

previous.excerpt: Use our collaborative editor to create motion graphics that respond to different states and user inputs. Then load your animations into apps, games, and websites with our open-source runtimes.
previous.title: Rive - Create and ship interactive animations to any platform

localize.description: 使用我们的协作编辑器来创建响应不同状态和用户输入的运动图形。然后利用我们的开源运行时，将您的动画加载到应用程序、游戏和网站中。
localize.tagline: 创建并发送交互式动画到任何平台

localize.description: 使用我們的協作編輯器來創建響應不同狀態和用戶輸入的運動圖形。然後利用我們的開源運行時，將您的動畫加載到應用程序、遊戲和網站中。
localize.tagline: 創建併發送交互式動畫到任何平臺

next.excerpt: Graze is the first true Video Based Social Networking App. Why waste endless time messaging and going on disappointing dates? Instead, you can spend 5 minutes or less on a Video Chat to find out if you have chemistry and a dynamic worth exploring in person.
next.title: Graze - Video first social networking for dating & meeting friends

localize.description: Graze是第一个真正的基于视频的社交网络应用。为什么要浪费无尽的时间发信息和进行令人失望的约会？相反，您可以花5分钟或更少的时间进行视频聊天，看看你们是否有化学反应和值得亲自探索的动态。
localize.tagline: 视频第一社交网络的约会和认识朋友

localize.description: Graze是第一個真正的基於視頻的社交網絡應用。爲什麼要浪費無盡的時間發信息和進行令人失望的約會？相反，您可以花5分鐘或更少的時間進行視頻聊天，看看你們是否有化學反應和值得親自探索的動態。
localize.tagline: 視頻第一社交網絡的約會和認識朋友
